classData.comment:
/**
 * Base class for main thread addons
 * @class Neo.main.addon.Base
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 *
 * This version aligns the file loading and readiness state according to the rule:
 * `initAsync()` MUST await for `loadFiles()` to be completed before the addon is considered `isReady`.
 * `preloadFilesDelay` controls when `loadFiles()` is initiated in the background, but can be
 * overridden by `cacheMethodCall()`.
 */
classData.name: Base

classData.comment:
/**
         * An identifier for core.Base to get handled like singletons for remote method access
         * @member {Boolean} isMainThreadAddon=true
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: An identifier for core.Base to get handled like singletons for remote method access
classData.name: isMainThreadAddon

classData.comment:
/**
         * Amount in ms to delay the background loading of library files.
         * Set to `false` to disable automated preloading and rely solely on lazy loading
         * via `cacheMethodCall()`. Set to `0` for immediate background preload.
         * @member {Boolean|Number} preloadFilesDelay=5000
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: Amount in ms to delay the background loading of library files. Set to false to disable automated preloading and rely solely on lazy loading via cacheMethodCall(). Set to 0 for immediate background preload.
classData.name: preloadFilesDelay

classData.comment:
/**
     * Internal cache for remote method calls received when `isReady` is false.
     * @member {Object[]} cache=[]
     */
classData.description: Internal cache for remote method calls received when isReady is false.
classData.name: cache

classData.comment:
/**
     * Returns true if `loadFiles()` has been initiated and is currently in progress.
     * @member {Boolean} isLoading
     */
classData.description: Returns true if loadFiles() has been initiated and is currently in progress.
classData.name: isLoading

classData.comment:
/**
     * A private promise that tracks the completion of `loadFiles()`.
     * This ensures `loadFiles()` is called only once and can be awaited by multiple consumers.
     * @member {Promise<void>|null} #loadFilesPromise=null
     */
classData.description: A private promise that tracks the completion of loadFiles(). This ensures loadFiles() is called only once and can be awaited by multiple consumers.
classData.name: #loadFilesPromise

classData.comment:
/**
     * The `resolve` function for `#loadFilesPromise`, allowing external control over its resolution.
     * @member {Function|null} #loadFilesPromiseResolver=null
     */
classData.description: The resolve function for #loadFilesPromise, allowing external control over its resolution.
classData.name: #loadFilesPromiseResolver

classData.description: Async initialization hook for instances. initAsync MUST await for loadFiles() to be completed. Only then the addon is ready.
classData.name: initAsync

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the `isReady` config got changed.
     * When `isReady` becomes true, any cached remote method calls are executed.
     * At this point, `initAsync` has already ensured that `me.#loadFilesPromise` is resolved.
     *
     * This method is kept synchronous, delegating the async cache processing to a private method.
     *
     * @param {Boolean} value
     * @param {Boolean} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description:
Triggered after the isReady config got changed. When isReady becomes true, any cached remote method calls are executed. At this point, initAsync has already ensured that me.#loadFilesPromise is resolved.

This method is kept synchronous, delegating the async cache processing to a private method.
classData.name: afterSetIsReady

classData.comment:
/**
     * Internally caches remote method calls if `isReady` is false.
     * It also ensures that `loadFiles()` is initiated immediately, bypassing `preloadFilesDelay`.
     * @param {Object} item - Contains method name (`fn`) and data (`data`).
     * @returns {Promise<unknown>} A promise that resolves with the method's return value.
     */
classData.description: Internally caches remote method calls if isReady is false. It also ensures that loadFiles() is initiated immediately, bypassing preloadFilesDelay.

returns.description: A promise that resolves with the method's return value.

classData.name: cacheMethodCall

classData.comment:
/**
     * Placeholder method for loading external files.
     * Subclasses (e.g., `Neo.main.addon.AmCharts`) must implement this.
     * It **must** return a Promise that resolves when all necessary files are loaded.
     * If `loadFiles()` is called multiple times, it should return the same pending promise
     * or a resolved promise if files are already loaded.
     * @returns {Promise<void>}
     */
classData.description: Placeholder method for loading external files. Subclasses (e.g., Neo.main.addon.AmCharts) must implement this. It must return a Promise that resolves when all necessary files are loaded. If loadFiles() is called multiple times, it should return the same pending promise or a resolved promise if files are already loaded.
classData.name: loadFiles

classData.comment:
/**
     * Handles intercepted remote method calls.
     * If the addon is not ready, the call is cached using `cacheMethodCall()`.
     * Otherwise, the original method is executed.
     * @param {Object} msg The remote message object.
     * @returns {Promise<any>} A promise that resolves with the method's return value.
     */
classData.description: Handles intercepted remote method calls. If the addon is not ready, the call is cached using cacheMethodCall(). Otherwise, the original method is executed.

returns.description: A promise that resolves with the method's return value.

classData.name: onInterceptRemotes
